context: Hi I am looking for a movie like Super Troopers (2001)
Is that a great one? I have never seen it. I have seen American Pie I mean American Pie (1999)
Yes Police Academy (1984) is very funny and so is Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment (1985)
It sounds like I need to check them out
I appreciate your time. I will need to check those out. Are there any others you would recommend?
Thank you i will watch that too
resp: you are welcome and also 48 Hrs. (1982)
